# 30th Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 30th edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. It awarded the best of 2020 in film. An award ceremony did not take place.
Awards
*Best Film: '
*Best Director: Hideo Jojo (')
*Best Actress: Nana Komatsu (Sakura, Threads: Our Tapestry of Love)
*Best Actor: Tsuyoshi Kusanagi (Midnight Swan)
*Emerging Director: Hikari (37 Seconds)
*Special:  (Mishima: The Last Debate)
*Special:  (''Why You Can't Be Prime Minister)
*Special Achievement:  (In recognition of his many years of accomplishments as a screenwriter, and as a member of the Nichipro Awards selection committee.)
*Special Achievement: Naoya Narita (In recognition of his many years of accomplishments as a producer, and as a member of the Nichipro Awards selection committee.)
